sentences.en: A generation ago genetic codes were certainly unknown.
sentences.cn: 遗传密码在上一代确实很少有人知道.

sentences.en: a genetic predisposition to liver disease
Aggression is part of our genetic make - up.
sentences.cn: 好斗是我们遗传个性的一部份.

sentences.en: Both of them were afflicted with a rare genetic disease, which struck in their thirties.
sentences.cn: 他们两个都得了一种罕见的遗传病，这种病在他们30多岁时发作。

sentences.en: Eye colour shows your genetic inheritance.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的颜色显示你的基因遗传特征。

sentences.en: Genetic abnormalities are more often associated with faults in paternal DNA than in maternal DNA.
sentences.cn: 相对于母本DNA，基因畸变往往更多地与父本DNA上的缺陷相关。

sentences.en: Genetic engineers transpose or exchange bits of hereditary material from one organism to the next.
sentences.cn: 遗传工程师将某一生物的小段遗传物质调换到另一生物，或与其互换。

sentences.en: Genetics is also bringing about dramatic changes in our understanding of cancer.
sentences.cn: 遗传学也正使我们对癌症的理解发生巨大的变化。

sentences.en: It's very difficult to treat genetic diseases.
sentences.cn: 遗传性疾病治疗起来很困难.

sentences.en: Scientists have found a genetic mutation that appears to be the cause of Huntington's disease.
sentences.cn: 科学家们已经发现了一种可能是引起亨廷顿舞蹈病的基因变异。

sentences.en: Scientists have used genetic engineering to protect tomatoes against the effects of freezing.
sentences.cn: 科学家利用遗传工程保护番茄免受严寒天气的影响。

sentences.en: Scientists provided the key to understanding the genetic code that determines every bodily feature.
sentences.cn: 科学家们找到了破解决定各种身体特征的遗传密码的密钥。

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 子女身上遗传了父母双方的基因型板。

sentences.en: The whole population is so inbred that no genetic differences remain.
sentences.cn: 整个族群都是同系繁殖，以至于根本不存在基因差异。

sentences.en: These compounds bind with genetic material in the liver.
sentences.cn: 这些化合物在肝脏中与遗传物质实现结合。

words.tran_cn: 基因的；由基因引起的；遗传学的；有关胚胎的
从遗传学角度；从基因方面

phrases.tran_cn: n. 遗传图谱；基因图谱
遗传资源，基因资源；生成资源
基因检测；遗传检测；遗传学检验

trans.tran_cn: 遗传的，基因的，起源的，起因的，演变的
